abstract.title: Abstract
abstract.p: The use of hydroxychloroquine (HCQ) has been considered a therapeutic option by international guidelines and expert opinions during the first phase of COVID‐19 pandemics, 1‐10 although scientific evidence remained too scarce to make a definitive recommendation 11. While HCQ use has now been questioned by recent data 7, some previous works draw attention to contrasting results on enhanced viral clearance after HCQ treatment 1‐6,10.
